attributes.action: Our rights were taken away from us...
attributes.additional_details:
(According to a poll carried out by the UK newspaper, The Telegraph, British citizens want their guns back,
the poll asked readers to submit ideas for laws they would like the legislature to take up. Among the suggestions, repeal the ban on handguns in the UK and re-open shooting clubs got 15,783 votes on the poll on May 31 2013).
Here is the link of a screenshot: http://gunssavelives.net/blog/uk-newspaper-poll-shows-brits-want-their-guns-back/

LAW-ABIDING BRITISH CITIZENS were forced to SURRENDER their firearms as some sort of panacea, but violent crime in the United Kingdom has actually gone up!
People must be able to fight back, and to defend oneself against an attack, it’s best to have a FIREARM. Millions of LAW-ABIDING AMERICANS understand that PRINCIPLE and have obtained concealed carry licenses and permits.
The right of self-defense is the oldest human right, the ten year Clinton ban on so-called “assault weapons” was just as INEFFECTIVE against CRIME too.
